concept.title: 5652.233-9000 Independent Review of Agency Protest Decision (2018) Section I

conbody.p: As prescribed in 5633.106 , insert the following clause,

In accordance with FAR 33.103(d)(4), interested parties may request an independent review at one level above the contracting officer. The independent review is available as an appeal of the contracting officerâ€™s decision on an agency protest. Requests for an independent review shall be submitted to the Contracting Officer for coordination.
